system.effect: Prerequisites: Minor Gift - Dream Mastery 2 AP - Extended Action Target: Self Effect: You fall into a deep sleep and dream a dream  that portends of things to come. If this Major Gift is  gained through Cresselia, you learn hints of a favorable  situation that will arise soon. If this Major Gift is gained  through Darkrai, you learn hints of a dangerous or  mournful situation that will arise soon.
